author: rbb
msg: Non-blocking connects shouldn't be calling connect a second
time.  According to Single Unix, a non-blocking connect has
succeeded when the select pops successfully.  It has failed
if the select failed.  The second connect was causing 502's

author: trawick
msg: Fix apr_dir_rewind() for Win32 to avoid returning a bogus error.

author: trawick
msg: fix the type of the length parameter to apr_hash_this()

author: trawick
msg: fix the APR_TEST_* macros to retrieve the proper APR error string
